tool_description: An API showing all the latest medical journals about common diseases from NIH National Library of Medicine.
name: Medical Articles Live
title: Medical Articles Live

api_list.name: Get Journals By Specific Disease
api_list.description: This endpoint retrieves journals on PubMed by specific diseases.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://medical-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com/journals/diabetes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medical-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://medical-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com/journals/{journalid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "medical-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Medical Journals
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the latest articles  on PubMed about the following diseases: HIV, allergies, asthma, depression, pneumonia, psoriasis, suicide, hypertension, hidradenitis, rheumatoid arthritis, migraine, diabetes, pregnancy, breast cancer, stroke, pancreatitis, and tuberculosis.
